Package qwirkle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    a board saved as a grid
    ComputerPlayer
    ComputerPlayer that extends Player Used by the server when a client wants to play against the computer Used by the client when a client wants to play as computer
    Coordinate
    A coordinate shows a position on the board using a xvalue and a yvalue
    Deck
    A deck where all tiles are stored
    FirstTurn
    This class is used when it is a firstTurn This automatically calculates the best move
    Game
    Game created from Server or Client
    HumanPlayer
    a HumanPlayer, instance of player
    Player
    Creating a player
    TestMove
    A class used to test a move and get the score of this move
    Tile
    Using Tiles
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tile.Color
    There are also 6 different colors
    Tile.Shape
    There are 6 different shapes
